key.label: API/Private Key
key.help: Google Maps API Key or Private Key.

client_id.label: Client ID
client_id.help: If you're using Google for Work, kindly specify your Client ID.

geocoding_type.label: Geocoding Type
geocoding_type.help: (Optional) The type of geocoding to be done. Default 'Reverse'.

parse_address.label: Parse Address
parse_address.help: Parse address when doing reverse geocoding. Outputs street address, city, state, postal code and country.
